Module dunbar.c195pa
Package dunbar.c195pa.Controller

Class CustomerInfoWindowController

java.lang.Object
dunbar.c195pa.Controller.CustomerInfoWindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CustomerInfoWindowController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The CustomerInfoWindowController controls the interface used to display information about all existing customers. It includes buttons to add, update, and delete customers, as well as to view all appointments for a specific selected customer.

    • changeWindowButton

      private void changeWindowButton(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, String newAddress) throws IOException
      Loads the specified scene for a new window.
      Parameters:
      event - An action even for a button press in the GUI
      newAddress - The package address for the desired FXML file
      Throws:
      IOException

    • closeAll

      void closeAll(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Closes all windows when the exit button is pressed.

    • deleteCustomer

      void deleteCustomer(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Deletes a selected customer from the database, as well as all appointments associated with that customer, when the delete button is pressed. Displays a confirmation prompt before deleting, and an information prompt after deletion. Refreshed the customer table after deletion to ensurethat the information is up-to-date.

    • openAppointments

      void openAppointments(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException, SQLException
      Opens a new CustomerAppointments window for the selected customer when the View Appointments button is pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException
      SQLException

    • returnToMain

      void returnToMain(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Returns to the Main window when the Back button is pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • toAddCustomerWindow

      void toAddCustomerWindow(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Opens the Add Customer window when the Add button is pressed.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • toUpdateWindow

      void toUpdateWindow(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Opens the Update Customer window when the Update button is pressed and a customer is selected. Invokes the UpdateCustomerWindowController loadCustomer method to populate the customer information.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)

      Refreshes the customerTable with the latest information from the database.
